import axios from"axios";var baseURL="/api/phonebook";var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseURL).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var add=function add(person){return axios.post(baseURL,person);};//.then(response => response.data)
var update=function update(id,person){return axios.put("".concat(baseURL,"/").concat(id),person).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var del=function del(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseURL,"/").concat(id));};export default{getAll:getAll,add:add,update:update,del:del};
